decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach combo to fill the graveyard with cheap artifacts and spells, then continuously recasting them for value and potentially winning the game with a large Grapeshot. It also includes various control elements like Tamiyo and Lightning Bolt to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Emry, Mishra's Bauble, and Urza's Saga provides additional recursion and value generation. The deck aims to assemble the combo pieces quickly and efficiently to overwhelm the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

The main focus of this UR Control deck is to effectively control the game through counterspells, removal spells, and disruption. By using cards like Counterspell, Force of Negation, and Spell Snare, the deck aims to prevent the opponent from resolving key spells and gaining advantage. Blood Moon is included to disrupt opponent's mana base, while cards like Snapcaster Mage and Preordain provide card advantage and flexibility. The deck also includes a few finishing creatures like Tishana's Tidebinder and Otawara, Soaring City, along with a couple of lands to help finish the game.

The deck aims to consistently ramp up mana and utilize abilities of lands like Urza's Saga, Lotus Field, and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to generate massive advantage and close the game with Primeval Titan, Scapeshift, or Malevolent Rumble. It also includes cards like Arboreal Grazer, Summoner's Pact, and Green Sun's Zenith to ensure a smooth and consistent combo execution. Furthermore, Aftermath Analyst and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove provide additional support and flexibility in both mana fixing and card advantage to maintain control and push towards victory.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful combo pieces like Primeval Titan and Amulet of Vigor to generate massive amounts of value and create explosive turns. The deck utilizes lands like Urza's Saga, Lotus Field, and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle for additional ramp and damage potential. It also includes cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Summoner's Pact to search for specific combo pieces, while Malevolent Rumble provides a board wipe option. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful plays.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and quickly dealing damage to the opponent. Cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Seasoned Pyromancer provide early game threats, while cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury give the deck reach and the ability to close out games. With efficient removal like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm, as well as additional burn spells like Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent while disrupting their strategy. The deck also includes a mix of lands to ensure consistency in mana production.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively unleash a combination of powerful creatures and spells to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Utilizing a mix of fast, low mana cost creatures like Ragavan and Phlage along with efficient removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment, the deck aims to chip away at the opponent's life total while maintaining board control. The inclusion of cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Guide of Souls provide additional support and synergy for the aggressive game plan. The deck also features elements of disruption and protection with cards like Thraben Charm and Static Prison.

The deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach to repeatedly cast spells from the graveyard, generating value through cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble. By sacrificing artifacts and triggering effects like Grinding Station, the deck can quickly mill through the library to find win conditions like Thassa's Oracle or Malevolent Rumble. The deck aims to set up a powerful combo while controlling the opponent's resources with disruption spells like Sink into Stupor and Swan Song. The key strategy involves efficiently using the graveyard and artifacts to create powerful and explosive turns.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures with disruptive elements to control the board and disrupt your opponent's gameplay. By combining creatures like Emperor of Bones and Overlord of the Balemurk with cards like Solitude and Fatal Push, you aim to apply pressure on your opponent while also removing threats. The inclusion of cards like Relic of Progenitus and Thoughtseize allows you to disrupt your opponent's graveyard and hand, giving you a strategic advantage. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with a mix of aggression and disruption.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures such as Orcish Bowmasters, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Scion of Draco to quickly overwhelm the opponent with damage. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact provide support by boosting the power of the creatures and providing protection. Tribal Flames and Lightning Bolt offer direct damage to finish off opponents. The deck also includes some control elements like Spell Snare and Stubborn Denial to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, this deck aims to win the game through early aggression and efficient creature combat.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures with powerful abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It also includes cards that provide additional control and removal options to maintain board presence. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistent access to the various colors needed for the spells and creatures in the deck. Ultimately, the goal of this deck is to apply constant pressure on the opponent while disrupting their strategies, leading to a swift victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive and efficient creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards that provide additional damage such as Tribal Flames and Leyline of the Guildpact, the deck aims to close out the game as quickly as possible. The inclusion of versatile spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial help control the board while pushing damage through. With a diverse mana base and powerful creatures like Phlage and Scion of Draco, this deck aims to maintain pressure and force the opponent to react in order to secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also has support cards like Guide of Souls and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah to boost the power of the creatures. The deck has some control elements with cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Additionally, there are some burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to finish off the opponent. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive playstyle of the deck.

This deck is focused on utilizing the Underworld Breach and Grinding Station combo to repeatedly mill cards from the opponent's library and win the game through the use of Thassa's Oracle. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student are used to help set up the combo and generate additional value. The deck also includes disruption in the form of counterspells and removal spells, as well as ways to generate mana quickly through artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Mox Opal. Urza's Saga provides additional utility and tutoring for key pieces of the combo.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly flood the board with aggressive creatures such as Hollow One, Nethergoyf, and Detective's Phoenix. By utilizing cards like Burning Inquiry and Faithless Looting, the deck aims to fill the graveyard with cards to enable the powerful abilities of Dauthi Voidwalker and Marauding Mako. With a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Goblin Lore for additional card draw, the deck is focused on fast-paced gameplay and overwhelming the opponent with a constant stream of threats.

This deck aims to quickly put high-powered creatures into play by using instant reanimation spells such as Goryo's Vengeance. The deck includes powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Ulamog, the Defiler, along with disruptive creatures like Dauthi Voidwalker. The use of cards like Psychic Frog and Picklock Prankster help to control the opponent's board while setting up the combo. The deck also includes removal spells like Fatal Push and disruption spells like Thoughtseize to ensure a smooth execution of the reanimation strategy.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and hand through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a stable board presence with powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils. The inclusion of a companion, Kaheera, the Orphanguard, adds an additional layer of consistency and synergy to the deck. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure smooth mana progression and access to all necessary colors for casting spells efficiently.
